annotations.description: I've had a ton of requests for a Peppermint Patty episode, but honestly I felt like there was nothing more to say on it... then I had an idea... Today on How...
annotations.title: Archer's Peppermint Patty plus New Drinks! | How to Drink

textContent:
1 egg white
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Creme de Banane
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Creme de Cacao
Barspoon of All-Spice Dram
Twist of Lemon
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. hot coffee

Dry Shake & Shake Again with ice
Strain
Garnish with Cocoa Powder

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7y0814PNpq4
title: A Night in Tunisia
